thread.title: Red Sox, Braves enjoy entertaining Twitter ‘beef’ leading up to Super Bowl LI
thread.title_full: Red Sox, Braves enjoy entertaining Twitter ‘beef’ leading up to Super Bowl LI

title: Red Sox, Braves enjoy entertaining Twitter ‘beef’ leading up to Super Bowl LI
text:
Tweet Local pride extends to the MLB squads, too. Kirby Lee-USA TODAY Sports 
The Braves started in Boston, but they’re Atlanta’s Major League Baseball team now. As a result, their rooting interest in Sunday’s Super Bowl LI at Houston’s NRG Stadium should be pretty obvious. 
Sorry, Boston Beaneaters fans. 
So to declare their support for the Atlanta Falcons, the Braves engaged in some Twitter shenanigans with the Boston Red Sox, who obviously are rooting for the New England Patriots. And it all started with this tweet: 
Hey @RedSox , hope you're ready to join us #InBrotherhood pic.twitter.com/BneBPUHHz4 
— Atlanta Braves (@Braves) February 3, 2017 
And it only got more entertaining from there. 
. @Braves Not so sure about that… We're busy looking for #OneMore ! pic.twitter.com/hznkqhswcI
